rows.label: qst701604_msg0001
rows.name:
Now then, shall we begin the
Adel Cup cooking contest?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0002
rows.name: The four chefs cooking today are these.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0003
rows.name: The manager of Café Amicus, Kozel!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0004
rows.name:
Secondly, introducing the
owner of this very inn, Fred!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0005
rows.name:
I thank you for generously
providing the venue.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0006
rows.name: And, the Paragon of Iira, Shin!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0007
rows.name:
Finally, it pains me to
introduce her... the
Heaven's Holy Grail, Hikari!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0008
rows.name: These four will compete.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0009
rows.name: As for the judges...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0010
rows.name:
The Emperor of the Superbian Empire,
His Majesty Hugo El Superbia.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0011
rows.name:
Maulton, who has come all the way
from Superbia to study cooking.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0012
rows.name:
The capital's foremost
gourmand, Morimori.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0013
rows.name:
And the growing children,
Milt and Satahiko.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0014
rows.name: And, myself.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0015
rows.name:
Everyone, please judge
with an impartial tongue,
without any favoritism.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0016
rows.name: I understand. Leave it to me.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0017
rows.name:
Even though it's a difficult
time, I hope this can be a nice
change of pace for everyone.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0018
rows.name: Now, shall we enjoy ourselves?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0101
rows.name: First, let's have Kozel.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0102
rows.name: Yes...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0103
rows.name:
What I have prepared is the
specialty menu of Café Amicus.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0104
rows.name: It is Tricolor Mottled Roll.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0105
rows.name: This is...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0106
rows.name: Three dishes mixed together...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0107
rows.name: That is what makes it a specialty.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0108
rows.name:
It's been a while since I
made it, so I'm not confident.
I hope you enjoy it...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0032
rows.name: Change of shot with short fade to black

rows.label: qst701604_msg0109
rows.name:
It's so filling, it's the
best, mo! I want to come here
every day from now on, mo!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0110
rows.name:
The three flavors are in perfect
harmony... You can't eat food
like this in Superbia...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0111
rows.name: It's delicious.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0112
rows.name: ...The leaves are unnecessary.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0113
rows.name:
It must be difficult to make this
since you have to make three dishes.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0114
rows.name:
The appearance is bold, but it's certainly
time-consuming. I think it's a dish
worthy of being an Iiran specialty.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0201
rows.name: Next is Fred.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0202
rows.name:
It's a pain to go after that
voluminous specialty dish, but...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0203
rows.name:
What I have prepared is the most
expensive dish at our inn.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0204
rows.name: Ooh!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0205
rows.name: Meat...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0206
rows.name: So straightforward...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0207
rows.name: Now, enjoy.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0208
rows.name:
The cooking is perfect... You can't
eat food like this in Superbia...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0209
rows.name: It's delicious.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0210
rows.name:
I've never had meat this
soft and delicious before!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0211
rows.name: ...It's good.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0212
rows.name:
It's certainly delicious, mo... But
if you use high-quality meat, anyone
could make something this good, mo.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0213
rows.name: You're harsh. I like it, though...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0301
rows.name: Next is Shin. Please.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0302
rows.name: Laura, which one should I serve?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0303
rows.name: Um, what should I do...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0304
rows.name:
Which one will you
submit to the contest?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0305
rows.name: Shin's Special Pan-Fried Tartari

rows.label: qst701604_msg0306
rows.name: Wingberry Cake

rows.label: qst701604_msg0311
rows.name: Let's go with the Pan-Fried Tartari!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0312
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0313
rows.name:
What I have made is...
Special Pan-Fried Tartari.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0314
rows.name: More meat...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0315
rows.name: Isn't this my favorite!!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0317
rows.name: It's good... It's the best.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0318
rows.name:
This is also very filling, mo!
Morumori is very satisfied, mo!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0319
rows.name:
It's fresh and juicy... You can't
eat food like this in Superbia...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0320
rows.name:
I like meat, but... it's
starting to get a bit heavy...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0321
rows.name:
My stomach is starting to
feel heavy as well...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0322
rows.name: ...Yeah.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0351
rows.name: Let's go with the Wingberry Cake!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0352
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0353
rows.name: What I have made is... Wingberry Cake.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0354
rows.name:
For someone with such a
cool appearance, you make
something quite cute, mo.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0355
rows.name: It's not like you, Shin...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0356
rows.name: Perhaps that contrast is the intention.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0357
rows.name:
It looks cute, and it's
delicious. I could eat
any number of these, mo!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0358
rows.name:
What a delicate dessert...
You can't eat food like
this in Superbia...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0359
rows.name:
After eating so much meat, it's a
relief to have something like this.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0360
rows.name: Ah, not too sweet, just right.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0361
rows.name: It soothes the stomach, doesn't it...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0362
rows.name: ...Are there any more Cranberry Bells?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0401
rows.name: Last is Hikari.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0402
rows.name:
You were aiming for
the win, weren't you?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0403
rows.name: Well, yeah...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0404
rows.name:
Thank you for making me the final
act. You understand well, don't
you? It's going to be exciting.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0405
rows.name:
No... I was just considering
everyone's stomach condition.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0406
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0407
rows.name:
You'll be amazed when
you see my masterpiece.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0408
rows.name: Uwah...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0409
rows.name: Geh...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0410
rows.name:
I'm really surprised
it was as expected...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0411
rows.name: It's awful!!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0412
rows.name: This might be the most intense yet...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0413
rows.name:
I have to give up after
just one bite, mo...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0414
rows.name: No, it's just barely edible.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0415
rows.name: On the contrary, this unique taste...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0416
rows.name:
It's becoming addictive...
You can't eat food like
this in Superbia...!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0417
rows.name:
Are Superbian people's
tongues broken...?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0501
rows.name:
Well, we've eaten the four
prideful dishes, and the
judges have also discussed it.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0502
rows.name:
I would like to announce the winner
of the Adel Cup cooking contest.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0503
rows.name: This is exciting...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0504
rows.name: I wonder if I can win...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0506
rows.name: The winner is...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0601
rows.name: Kozel's Tricolor Mottled Roll!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0602
rows.name: ...I'm honored.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0603
rows.name:
I think you're still
the best chef in Iira.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0604
rows.name:
It's not easy to combine
three dishes so well, mo.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0605
rows.name:
I know you've been through a
lot, but I hope you continue
to make that specialty.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0606
rows.name:
...Thank you. In a way, it's
thanks to Maulton-san that I was
able to become positive again.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0607
rows.name:
If you think so, then later,
teach me the secret of the
Tricolor Mottled Roll.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0608
rows.name: That... I must refuse.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0609
rows.name: Hey Adel...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0610
rows.name: Why didn't my dish win?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0611
rows.name: Well, well...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0612
rows.name: It was close, though.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0613
rows.name: It was delicious!?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0614
rows.name: Shin... That's too bad.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0615
rows.name: I guess so...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0616
rows.name:
But this was a first for me,
so it was a little fun.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0617
rows.name: You're right.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0618
rows.name:
As Adel said at the beginning, if
we had fun, then it's good, right?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0619
rows.name:
Yes! I had fun too! My
heart was pounding.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0620
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0701
rows.name: Shin's Wingberry Cake!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0702
rows.name: We did it!!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0703
rows.name: We did it!!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0704
rows.name:
After a series of rich
dishes, that refreshing
and subtly sweet cake...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0705
rows.name: It was perfect timing.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0706
rows.name:
And after that came Hikari's
destructively powerful food...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0707
rows.name:
It reminded me once again how
delicious Shin's dessert was.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0708
rows.name:
Hey! Are you saying my
dessert supported his?

rows.label: qst701604_msg0709
rows.name: Well... I guess so.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0710
rows.name:
Shin, you should thank me. You can
even split the prize money with me.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0711
rows.name:
Thank you, Laura. It
was a good decision.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0712
rows.name: We won because of Shin's skill.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0713
rows.name: Kasumi's advice was also a help.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0714
rows.name: I'm glad I could be of service.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0801
rows.name:
Now, with this, the Adel Cup
cooking contest is over.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0802
rows.name:
I'd like to hold a second one
someday, so until then, everyone,
please polish your skills.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0803
rows.name:
Maybe I'll participate
as a cook next time.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0804
rows.name:
Morimori is fine being a
judge next time too, mo.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0805
rows.name:
If you're okay with this
place, feel free to use
it as much as you want.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0806
rows.name: Shin, let's do our best next time too.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0807
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: qst701604_msg0808
rows.name: I'll polish my skills as well.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0809
rows.name: I'll definitely win next time!

rows.label: qst701604_msg0810
rows.name: ...You should probably stop.

rows.label: qst701604_msg0811
rows.name: Someone might die next time...
